entry.title: Japan to Build a More Powerful Military, Citing China as Its No. 1 Menace
entry.content: Japan called China its biggest security challenge and said it would sharply raise military spending including for missiles that can hit other countries.

entry.title: Russia Targets Infrastructure Across Ukraine in Latest Barrage
entry.content: Russia fired a barrage of missiles targeting energy infrastructure in Kyiv and other Ukrainian cities, part of a campaign to wear down its adversary while rebuilding for an expected renewed ground offensive.

entry.title: Russia's Influence Campaign in Africa Targets a U.S. Ally
entry.content: As Americaâ€™s sway across the resource-rich continent has declined, Moscow has stepped up its efforts to boost support, including in Uganda.
